mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.peijian_churu_inout_uuid_number as peijianChuruInoutUuidNumber ,a.peijian_churu_inout_name as peijianChuruInoutName ,a.peijian_churu_inout_types as peijianChuruInoutTypes ,a.peijian_churu_inout_content as peijianChuruInoutContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM peijian_churu_inout a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.peijian_churu_inout_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.peijianChuruInoutUuidNumber},'%')
and a.peijian_churu_inout_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.peijianChuruInoutName},'%')
and a.peijian_churu_inout_types = #{params.peijianChuruInoutTypes}
and a.peijian_churu_inout_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.peijianChuruInoutContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
